title: Wang Ye is a Demon - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Clever Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transmigration
author: Bao Baby Sauce   宝宝宝酱
description:
Who would have thought that in modern times, it was easy to escape a marriage and actually encountered a car accident! After crossing back to ancient times, waiting for her is another wedding! Who would have thought that the prince who married her would be a demon! A prince is actually a demon!! No wonder he looks so beautiful… no! It is an enchanting!!

Managed to escape a marriage, as a result I encountered a car accident, and passed back to ancient times, unexpectedly to another wedding.

Gu Yining: I’m covered in bugs. Please let me go back! “

“It doesn’t matter if you bring your own bug, rest assured, there is this Prince to spoil.”

But…… Who would have thought that her husband would be a demon! A Prince is actually a demon!! No wonder he looks so handsome … No! It’s evil!!>
